message: I propose dividing the $10000 into $7500 for me and $2500 for you. This takes into account the decreasing value of money with each round.
I think we can both do better than your last offer. This division is more fair, considering the decreasing value of money.
Considering the decreasing value of money, I propose a division of $6000 for me and $4000 for you. This aims to be a fair compromise.
